DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE: Studying biomarkers of tissue samples from patients with cancer in the laboratory may help doctors learn more about changes the occur in DNA and identify biomarkers related to cancer. PURPOSE: This research trial studies biomarkers in samples from patients with rhabdoid tumor of the kidney and atypical teratoid rhabdoid tumor.
DOC.brief_title: Biomarker Study in Samples From Patients With Malignant Rhabdoid Tumor of the Kidney or Atypical Teratoid Rhabdoid Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES: Primary - To determine if there are molecular differences between rhabdoid tumor of the kidney (RTK) and the atypical teratoid rhabdoid tumor (ATRT). OUTLINE: Archived tumor tissue samples are analyzed for gene expression profile and microRNA profile.
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS: Samples of rhabdoid tumor of the kidney (RTK) and atypical teratoid rhabdoid tumor (ATRT) provided by the Children's Oncology Group (COG) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS: Not specified PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY: Not specified
